code: import{signup}from"../../types";export var signUpAction=function signUpAction(email){return{type:signup,payload:email};};var URL="https://motion.propulsion-home.ch/backend/api/auth/registration/";export var signUpFunction=function signUpFunction(data){return function(dispatch){var headers=new Headers({'Content-Type':'application/json'});var config={method:'POST',body:JSON.stringify(data),headers:headers};fetch(URL,config);var email=data.email;dispatch(signUpAction(email));};};
